titles.title: MOVE Act
More Opportunities for Veterans Education Act
MOVE Act
To extend the delimiting period for certain individuals to use educational assistance benefits administered by the Department of Veterans Affairs.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Veterans' Affairs.

bill.summary:
More Opportunities for Veterans Education Act or the MOVE Act
This bill extends the delimiting period (the period after which no benefits may be paid) for the use of educational assistance benefits for certain individuals who first used benefits under the Veteran Readiness and Employment program.
